name: @radio-inventar/shared
_comment_metadata: Metadata fields (version, description, keywords, author, license) are kept for documentation and potential future publishing. These fields are ignored by npm/pnpm when private: true is set.
description: Shared TypeScript types and Zod schemas for Radio-Inventar
author: Radio-Inventar Team
_comment_legacy_fields: main/types fields provide backwards compatibility for older tools. Modern consumers use exports field.
_comment_files: files field kept for documentation of what would be published if package becomes public.
_comment_wildcard_export: The ./* wildcard export enables direct imports like '@radio-inventar/shared/schemas/device.schema' for tree-shaking and selective imports. TypeScript and bundlers handle the .js/.d.ts extension mapping automatically - consumers must include the file basename (e.g., 'import { DeviceSchema } from "@radio-inventar/shared/schemas/device.schema"' NOT "...schemas/device").
_comment_peerDependencies: TypeScript is required for BUILD (devDependency in root package.json) but optional for CONSUMPTION: (1) JS-only consumers can use Zod runtime validation without TS, (2) .d.ts files are included in dist/ for TS consumers, (3) TS version is enforced at dev time via root package.json
